title: GV330: Data Science Applications to Politics Research
text:
Welcome to the course website for GV330: Data Science Applications to Politics Research. This website will be the primary location for all course materials, including the syllabus, lecture slides, and assignments.
Office Hours: Please sign up via the Student Hub
Undergraduate Administration: Office CBG 3.20. Opening Hours: 10:00-12:30 and 13:30-16:00. Email: gov.ug@lse.ac.uk
Seminars: Seminars will take place as shown on the timetable.
Course Lecturers: Zach Dickson & Dan de Kadt

title: Topic 1
section: Week 3: Causality, Credibility, and “Big Data” II
text: Week 3: Causality, Credibility, and “Big Data” II
